page.title: 06Teenagers in Crediton
page.content: In Crediton the{fashion}for the summer of 1985 is{pastel colours: pink, white, light blue, light green and yellow; also bright coloured {floral patterns.}The accessories in use are thick bangles and sparkly {jewellery}which are sold in most of the fashion shops along the High Street. There are three gangs -{Mods, {Breakdancers}and{Neutrals.}Mods wear long dark green jackets which go down to the calves. Breakdancers wear Nike} jackets which are either half black and half grey or half blue and half grey. They also wear baseball boots which are white trainers that come up the ankle. As you may think, this gang {dances}- some moves are the caterpillar, moonwalk, turtle, backspin, L.A. and swallow dive.
